letters.description: Master the science of macronutrients, micronutrients, and bio-individuality.
Address gut health, absorption, and the microbiome as the core of wellness.
Identify metabolic imbalances, deficiencies, and lifestyle triggers.
Use targeted protocols to restore hormonal, immune, and energy balance.
Combine food-as-medicine with evidence-based lifestyle interventions.
Create lasting behavioral change through coaching psychology.
Connect body, mind, and spirit for comprehensive transformation.
